name: Contracts
description:
Contracts is a 2D FPS sniper game where your goal is to assassinate designated targets with precision and  speed whilst avoiding detection.  

Backstory

You play as a retired sniper from the Marine Corps sniper division. After 20 years,  one day while at his makeshift training area, insert name is approached by a man in black. eager to hire his sniping skills to tackle corruption around the world, the man in black leaves him with a simple choice. Live out the rest of your days alone in this wasteland or do something that could change the world. With gun in case and curiosity playing on his mind, he boards the next flight outbound.

Controls

Look Around - Mouse

Shoot - Left Click

Scope - Right Click

Zoom - Scroll Wheel

Player Note: Some targets appear to be out of the border of the screen, but by zooming in it allows the player to move out of the bounds.
